menu.description: Grilled chicken breast served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

menu.description: Warm chocolate brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, whipped cream, and chocolate sauce.

menu.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry

menu.name: Mushroom Risotto
menu.description: Creamy risotto cooked with mushrooms, onions, garlic, and Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Greek Salad
